venue.address_1: Address will be sent to Yes RSVP's or call 617-470-3395
venue.name: Le Fountain

item.description:
FASTING NOVICE OR EXPERTS

Have you been treating yourself with optimal care?

Are you ready to have a break through?

Do you need some positive support?

Join us for a WINTER DETOX! 3 Days of Celebrating the renewal of health & well-being! We will gather a couple of hours each day on - December 7th, 8th, & 9th, 2012

Friday - 6pm: Meet, Greet, & Video;

Saturday - 8:30am: Nature Walk;

Sunday 10:30am: Juice & Smoothies.

$45 or $20 per day.

Supporting the Vibrant You!

Address will be sent via Meetup Message to Yes RSVPs a day or two before the event starts. Questions? Email: maya_wilkes@yahoo.com or call Maya at 617-470-3395.
item.how_to_find_us: 10 minute walk from Malden Center T Stop
item.name: Winter Detox
